name: Shaolin
overview: You are the Shaolin Master's young apprentice Bruise Lei who must prove his worth and defend the Shaolin Temple. Battle it out with the evil henchmen, recover the 40 sacred idols and avenge your fallen master to reveal the secret hidden treasures and mystic scrolls of the Shaolin Temple. Published in Commodore Zone Issue #16 / re-released by Psytronik Software. Coding and Music/Sound: Jonathan Wells Graphics: Jonathan Wells and Carl Mason
